description:
Lore-friendly version. All mechs available from their lore-accurate introduction dates.

Adds 27 Inner Sphere OmniMech variants to the game.

Blackjack II - 7 variants
Firestarter - 9 variants
Owens - 3 variants
Strider - 5 variants
Templar - 3 variants

Required mods:
Yet Another Mech Lab
Yet Another Weapon Mod
author: Snafulator
